name: Bot Paper Scissors
description:
The theme for Weekly Game Jam Week 154 was Rock Paper Scissors. In this game you are playing a game based off the idea of the TV show BattleBots.

There are three bots to choose from with each having an advantage over one of the other bots and a disadvantage over the other, similar to how the game of Rock Paper Scissors works.

FlameBot > HammerBot

HammerBot > FlipperBot

FlipperBot > FlamBot

After you choose a bot, the AI opponent randomly chooses a bot and you fight in the arena.

WASD to Move, Left-Click to Attack, Esc to Pause

Fullscreen is recommended
